reviewText: I love Lidia and her show but to only put 4 episodes per disk is a waste. Why not make a box set with more episodes per disk. Its too expensive to get the entire set on DVD when you have to buy so many at an expensive cost each. Very disappointing way to market a product.

it is very poor info on that dvd ! need more recepies ! I am a cook myself not a dvd colector , therefore I need dvd-s with more recepies on it !!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!! I have two book from Lidia with over 300 recepies , and I need those on dvd !
